sentences.sentence: You would remember every shovelful, every moment!
sentences.translation: 你应该会记得当时的每铲土！

sentences.sentence: You would remember every shovelful, every moment.
sentences.translation: 你应该记得那时的每铲土。

sentences.sentence: Should I put another shovelful of coal on the fire?
sentences.translation: 我要再往火里添一铲煤吗？
